channel.title: Books on Nathan Wang-Ly
channel.description: Recent content in Books on Nathan Wang-Ly

item.title: 2021 Books
item.description: The Alignment Problem: How Can Machines Learn Human Values Brian Christian ★★★★★ XYZ The Ride of a Lifetime: Lessons Learned from 15 Years as CEO of the Walt Disney Company Cal Newport ★★★★★ XYZ Straight Choices: The Psychology of Decision Making Ben Newell, David Shanks, David Lagnado ★★★★★ XYZ How to Avoid a Climate Disaster: The Solutions We Have and the Breakthroughs We Need Bill Gates ★★★★★ XYZ A Promised Land

item.title: 2022 Books
item.description: The Making of a Manager: What to Do When Everyone Looks to You Julie Zhuo ★★★★★ XYZ So Good They Can’t Ignore You Cal Newport ★★★★☆ XYZ Behavioral Science in the Wild Nina Mazar, Dilip Soman ★★★★☆ XYZ The Voltage Effect: How to Make Good Ideas Great and Great Ideas Scale John List ★★★★☆ XYZ Predictably Irrational: The Hidden Forces That Shape Our Decisions Dan Ariely ★★★★☆ XYZ

item.title: Other Books
item.description: This page is a collection of the “non-work-related” books I’ve read (since 2019) that I didn’t think were worth including in the main lists. The list is organised by rating (highest to lowest). The same rating system applies :) ★★★★★ 5 stars ★★★★☆ 4 stars ★★★☆☆ 3 stars ★★☆☆☆ 2 stars ★★★★★ 5 stars The Seven Deaths of Evelyn Hardcastle Stuart Turton I’ll Be Gone in the Dark Michelle McNamara
